Package elements

Class SpotLight

java.lang.Object
elements.Light
elements.PointLight
elements.SpotLight
All Implemented Interfaces:
LightSource
public class SpotLight
extends PointLight
this class represent a spot light with direction and intensity of the light and also can make a flashlight by focusing the the light
Author:
Noam Shushan

    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Vector _direction

    private double _focus
    focus the light to get a beam of light that is bounded like a flashlight
